messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Al: I intend to perfect my Double
Battle technique.That will make me better all around.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Al: You! You’re an expert
double battler, too!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Al: Your mastery over several
Pokémon at once...You’re a remarkable Trainer!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Al: You have but one Pokémon?I would say that you are taking
Victory Road too lightly, kid.
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Kay: I want to improve my doubles
technique as much as I can.That will improve me as a Trainer.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_2:
Kay: My goodness!
You’re great at doubles, too!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Kay: Depending on the combinations,
every kind of Pokémon can excel.At least, that’s what I think.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Kay: You’re really going through
Victory Road with only one Pokémon?
